{"id":1253602796,"question_id":3351,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1715263594,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"34 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1253602796/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximize Happiness of Selected Children","memory":"61.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maximumHappinessSum(int[] happiness, int k) {\n        // O(n log k + k)\n        // int spots_filled = 0;\n        // int[] topK = new int[k];\n        // for (int i = 0; i < happiness.length; i++) {\n        //     placeIfBig(topK, happiness[i], spots_filled);\n        // }\n\n        Arrays.sort(happiness);\n        long sum = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n            if (happiness[happiness.length - 1 - i] <= i) { // rest are zero\n                break;\n            }\n            sum += happiness[happiness.length - 1 - i] - i;\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n\n    // private void placeIfBig(int[] topK, int happiness, int spots_filled) {\n    //     if (spots_filled < topK.length) {\n    //         topK[spots_filled] = happiness;\n    //     }\n\n    //     for (int i = 0; i < topK.length; i++) {\n    //         if (topK[i] < happiness) {\n    //             topK[i] = happiness;\n    //         }\n    //     }\n    // }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-happiness-of-selected-children","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
